text: The 2015 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on 10 June 2015, at the Studio 4 MNCTV, Taman Mini Indonesia Indah in Pondok Gede, East Jakarta, and hosted by Zsa Zsa Utari, Joshua Suherman, Romaria, Tissa Biani, and Rangga Dewamoela. List the nominations of 2015 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2015-05-20 2015 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards held more colorful retrieved on 2015-06-08 Usually appear excited, this Syahrini's style at 2015 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids Choice Awards retrieved on 2015-06-10 The ceremony awards will held the theme for "Slimenya Tuh Disini". Syahrini received the "Icon of the Year" award and was the biggest winner of the night, taking home two awards. ==Performances== * JKT48 – "Refrain Yang Penuh Harapan" * Romaria, Jojo-Baila Idol Junior – "Malu Sama Kucing" * Raisa – "Could It Be" * Syahrini – "Seperti Itu" * Kotak – "Inspirasi Sahabat" * Raisa – "Teka Teki" * Virzha – "Di Atas Awan" * JKT48 – "Pareo Adalah Emerald" ==Presenters== * Gracia Indri, Alifa and Dede Cungkring – Presented Favorite Singer * Andi Arsyil, Citra Kirana and Gilang Dirga – Presented Favorite Group/Band/Duo * Cut Meyriska, Limbad, Danang and Darto– Presented Favorite Cartoon * Syahnaz Sadiqah, Baim and Narji – Presented Favorite Magician * Bow Vernon, Chika Jessica and Ammar Zoni – Presented Favorite Actress * Haruka JKT48, Ve JKT48 and Melody JKT48 – Presented Favorite Host * Syahrini and Raffi Ahmad – Presented Favorite Actor * Nikita Willy and Tarra Budiman – Presented Icon of the Year ==Winners and nominees== The nominees were announced on May 4, 2015. Winners are listed in bold. title: 2015 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
